response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its immense value to you, estimated at $15,000, I propose an offer to acquire it for $12,000. This price reflects a strategic compromise, aiming to ensure both parties' satisfaction while maximizing my return on investment. I look forward to your consideration and potential acceptance of this offer.", "product_price": 12000}
